description:
Join Bumb, Berzerk, Speedster and Uncle Time as they run, fly, bounce, glide and break their way through the magical lands of Gnomia to reach their mysterious destiny. You can help them save the kingdom, find a princess and collect hundreds of precious lost socks.

Game Features:
jumping, smashing, gliding, flying, falling, speeding
simple sit-and-play gameplay
challenging try-and-die difficulty
45 levels in magical land of Gnomia
4 switchable characters


and also:
gliding pants
horned hats
actual time distortion
overabundance of socks
name: 2 Fast 4 Gnomz
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
